Release date discrepancy: The expert noted that the claimed movie poster listed a release date of February 30, which does not exist, indicating that it is not authentic.
Use of an old image: The expert pointed out that the image used in the movie poster was an old picture of Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson, suggesting that it was not an official poster but rather a fan creation.
Addition of cartoon character: s signature hairdo: The expert observed that the creator of the poster simply added Johnny Bravo's signature hairdo to the image of Dwayne Johnson, further indicating that it was not an official promotional material.
Fan art category: The expert mentioned that the poster for the PowerPuff Girls film was shared in the "fan art" category on Deviant Art, suggesting that it was created by a fan rather than an official source.
